ComicInfo.Summary:
Omega-powered psionic, Peter Stanchek, and his girlfriend, Kris Hathaway, are on the run. Only by recruiting Pete's fellow Harbingers -- Torque, Flamingo, and Zephyr-- can they hope to stay one step ahead of the Harbinger Foundation.
Escaping the Harbinger Foundation with his girlfriend, Kris Hathaway, Pete Stanchek recruits other Harbingers to join the fight against Toyo Harada and his world-conquering plans. Possessing the Omega Power, which allows him to bring out the latent talents in other Harbingers, Pete enlists the flying Zephyr, the pyrokinetic Flamingo, and the super-strong Torque. With the Harbinger Foundation in hot pursuit, their struggles begin!
First "original" Valiant universe title.
1st appearance:
The Renegades: Peter Stanchek (Sting)Kris HathawayFaith Herbert (Zephyr)Charlene Dupre (Flamingo)John Torkelson (Torque)EelLumpWeaselNote: Harbinger #0 was bagged with the first Harbinger trade thus originally released after Harbinger #1.
Contains the first of six coupons for Harbinger #0 Pink Edition.
